ComicInfo.Summary: Doctors perform medical tests on Michael and tell him that the cancer has moved to his entire body and he doesn't have much longer to live. The Catholic church begins to monitor a young man who raised a boy from the dead in Central Park. They also put a hit out on Michael for killing a priest during a recent mission. Gaby and the police move in on a serial killer who has been targeting young boys. Three professional assassins try to take Michael out in a bar but he gets the best of them and gets to go home with the stripper.
